body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

Running ```spack spec``` for gromacs, I am getting some older dependency versions picks that cause the build to crash. In particular, ```^intel-mkl@11.3.3.210``` and ```^openssl@1.0.2k-fips```.

Here's the clingo ```spack spec``` output:
```
$ spack spec -I gromacs%gcc@8.3.0 +cuda+lapack+plumed target=nehalem ^intel-mkl threads=openmp ^intel-mpi
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   gromacs%gcc@8.3.0+cuda+lapack+plumed arch=linux-None-nehalem
 -       ^intel-mkl threads=openmp
 -       ^intel-mpi

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   gromacs@2021.3%gcc@8.3.0~blas+cuda~cycle_subcounters~double+hwloc~ipo+lapack~mdrun_only+mpi~nosuffix~opencl+openmp+plumed~relaxed_double_precision+shared~sycl build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^cmake@3.21.4%gcc@8.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt build_type=Release arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -           ^ncurses@5.9.20130511%gcc@8.3.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none patches=f84b2708a42777aadcc7f502a261afe10ca5646a51c1ef8b5e60d2070d926b57 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -           ^openssl@1.0.2k-fips%gcc@8.3.0~docs certs=system arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -       ^cuda@11.5.0%gcc@8.3.0~dev arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^libxml2@2.9.12%gcc@8.3.0~python arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
[+]              ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@8.3.0 libs=shared,static arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -               ^pkg-config@0.27.1%gcc@8.3.0+internal_glib patches=49ffcd644e190dc5efcb2fab491177811ea746c1a526f75d77118c2706574358 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -               ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@8.3.0~pic libs=shared,static arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -               ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -       ^fftw@3.3.10%gcc@8.3.0+mpi~openmp~pfft_patches precision=double,float arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^intel-mpi@2019.10.317%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^hwloc@2.6.0%gcc@8.3.0~cairo~cuda~gl~libudev+libxml2~netloc~nvml~opencl+pci~rocm+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -           ^libpciaccess@0.16%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -               ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                   ^m4@1.4.16%gcc@8.3.0+sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -               ^util-macros@1.19.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -       ^intel-mkl@11.3.3.210%gcc@8.3.0~ilp64+shared threads=openmp arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
[+]          ^cpio@2.13%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^plumed@2.6.3%gcc@8.3.0+gsl+mpi+shared arrayfire=none optional_modules=all arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -           ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@8.3.0 patches=7793209b33013dc0f81208718c68440c5aae80e7a1c4b8d336e382525af791a7 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -           ^automake@1.16.2%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -           ^gsl@2.7%gcc@8.3.0~external-cblas arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -           ^py-cython@0.29.24%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -               ^py-setuptools@58.2.0%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                   ^python@3.8.12%gcc@8.3.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=0d98e93189bc278fbc37a50ed7f183bd8aaf249a8e1670a465f0db6bb4f8cf87,4c2457325f2b608b1b6a2c63087df8c26e07db3e3d493caf36a56f0ecf6fb768,f2fd060afc4b4618fe8104c4c5d771f36dc55b1db5a4623785a4ea707ec72fb4 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                       ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@8.3.0~debug~pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                           ^diffutils@3.8%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                       ^expat@2.4.1%gcc@8.3.0+libbsd arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                           ^libbsd@0.11.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                               ^libmd@1.0.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                       ^gdbm@1.21%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                           ^readline@8.1%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                       ^gettext@0.21%gcc@8.3.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                           ^tar@1.34%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                       ^libffi@3.3%gcc@8.3.0 patches=26f26c6f29a7ce9bf370ad3ab2610f99365b4bdd7b82e7c31df41a3370d685c0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                       ^sqlite@3.36.0%gcc@8.3.0+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
 -                       ^util-linux-uuid@2.36.2%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```
Here's the original concretizer output, which is OK:
```
$ spack spec -I gromacs%gcc@8.3.0 +cuda+lapack+plumed target=nehalem ^intel-mkl threads=openmp ^intel-mpi
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   gromacs%gcc@8.3.0+cuda+lapack+plumed arch=linux-None-nehalem
 -       ^intel-mkl threads=openmp
 -       ^intel-mpi

Concretized
--------------------------------
==> Warning: the original concretizer is currently being used.
	Upgrade to "clingo" at your earliest convenience. The original concretizer will be removed from Spack starting at v0.18.0
 -   gromacs@2021.3%gcc@8.3.0~blas+cuda~cycle_subcounters~double+hwloc~ipo+lapack~mdrun_only+mpi~nosuffix~opencl+openmp+plumed~relaxed_double_precision+shared~sycl build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^cmake@3.21.4%gcc@8.3.0~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt build_type=Release arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@8.3.0~symlinks+termlib abi=none arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -               ^pkgconf@1.8.0%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^openssl@1.1.1l%gcc@8.3.0~docs certs=system arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -               ^perl@5.34.0%gcc@8.3.0+cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                   ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@8.3.0+cxx~docs+stl patches=b231fcc4d5cff05e5c3a4814f6a5af0e9a966428dc2176540d2c05aff41de522 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                   ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@8.3.0~debug~pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                       ^diffutils@3.8%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                           ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@8.3.0 libs=shared,static arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                   ^gdbm@1.19%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                       ^readline@8.1%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                   ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@8.3.0+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^cuda@11.5.0%gcc@8.3.0~dev arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^libxml2@2.9.12%gcc@8.3.0~python arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -               ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@8.3.0~pic libs=shared,static arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^hwloc@2.6.0%gcc@8.3.0~cairo~cuda~gl~libudev+libxml2~netloc~nvml~opencl+pci~rocm+shared arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^libpciaccess@0.16%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -               ^libtool@2.4.6%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                   ^m4@1.4.16%gcc@8.3.0+sigsegv arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -               ^util-macros@1.19.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^intel-mkl@2020.4.304%gcc@8.3.0~ilp64+shared threads=openmp arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
[+]          ^cpio@2.13%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^intel-mpi@2019.10.317%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -       ^plumed@2.7.1%gcc@8.3.0+gsl+mpi+shared arrayfire=none optional_modules=all arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^autoconf@2.69%gcc@8.3.0 patches=7793209b33013dc0f81208718c68440c5aae80e7a1c4b8d336e382525af791a7 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^automake@1.13.4%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^gsl@2.7%gcc@8.3.0~external-cblas arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -           ^py-cython@0.29.24%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -               ^py-setuptools@58.2.0%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                   ^python@3.8.12%gcc@8.3.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=0d98e93189bc278fbc37a50ed7f183bd8aaf249a8e1670a465f0db6bb4f8cf87,4c2457325f2b608b1b6a2c63087df8c26e07db3e3d493caf36a56f0ecf6fb768,f2fd060afc4b4618fe8104c4c5d771f36dc55b1db5a4623785a4ea707ec72fb4 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                       ^expat@2.4.1%gcc@8.3.0+libbsd arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                           ^libbsd@0.11.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                               ^libmd@1.0.3%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                       ^gettext@0.21%gcc@8.3.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                           ^tar@1.34%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                       ^libffi@3.3%gcc@8.3.0 patches=26f26c6f29a7ce9bf370ad3ab2610f99365b4bdd7b82e7c31df41a3370d685c0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                       ^sqlite@3.36.0%gcc@8.3.0+column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
 -                       ^util-linux-uuid@2.36.2%gcc@8.3.0 arch=linux-centos7-nehalem
```

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.17.0
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** clingo
```

### Additional information

I did not attach build logs since the issue shows up in the spec. 

Tagging @alalazo , @junghans.

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: clingo concretizer in 0.17.0 has some strange dependency version picks
